description: Changes the password for the currently signed-in user. Authorize this action with a signed-in user's access token. It must include the scope aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

parameters.name: ProposedPassword
parameters.description: A new password that you prompted the user to enter in your application.

parameters.name: AccessToken
parameters.description: A valid access token that Amazon Cognito issued to the user whose password you want to change.
